thread.title: Breyanna Brooks
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Breyanna Brooks

author: Breyanna Brooks
title: Breyanna Brooks
text: I have been coming to Colonial Properties each year since September 2012, I have absolutely LOVED everything about every Cabin that my family and I have stayed in. From a 2 bedroom cabin to a 5 bedroom cabin, I think every family deserves a great getaway in the Smoky's.☺ let's not forget to mention, all of the wonderful attractions nearby. Can't wait to try the Happily Ever After Cabin, this Valentine's Day with my Honey ☺ they have stolen my Vote I wouldn't dare rent from any other company while staying in Gatlinburg
